audio_description: Today we’ll teach you how to make Mughal Darbar-style chicken biryani at home using a rice cooker. If you’ve ever tried Mughal Darbar’s biryani, you probably liked it. That’s why this recipe was highly requested.

audio_description: Mix all the ingredients — rice, chicken, and spices — thoroughly. Cook it in the rice cooker twice. First cook it once, stir gently, then cook it a second time. This ensures everything is perfectly done.

audio_description: Always scoop biryani from the sides, not the center — that helps prevent the rice from breaking. The biryani rice is ready now. Let it cool down before serving.
